source:
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

ft_Interfaces_path = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataMultidim/minecare/delta/ft_Interfaces/'


#drop ft_Interfaces

spark.sql('drop table IF EXISTS delta.ft_Interfaces')

if (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, ft_Interfaces_path)):
   mssparkutils.fs.rm(ft_Interfaces_path, recurse=True)

table_name = 'statusDetails'
db_name = 'delta'
table_data_path = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataTemp/minecare/delta/' + table_name +'/'

sql_command = f'''
                    CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE {db_name}.{table_name} (                    
                        eqmtId int,
                        eqmtName string,
                        lastReadyTime timestamp,
                        lastReadyFinishTime timestamp
                      )
                    USING DELTA
                    LOCATION '{table_data_path}'
                  '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
            create or replace temporary view statusDetail_temp
            as
            SELECT eu.Id, eu.Name, MAX(eh.ReadTime), null
            FROM delta.equipmenttrackhistory_historico eh 
            LEFT JOIN delta.equipmentunit_historico eu ON eu.Id = eh.EquipmentId
            WHERE eu.RecordStatus <> 3
            AND eh.StatusId = 2
            AND ReadTime BETWEEN date_Add(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),-90) AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
            GROUP BY eu.Id, eu.Name
            '''

spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
                insert into delta.statusdetails
                select * from statusDetail_temp
                '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
            update delta.statusdetails 
            set lastReadyFinishTime = (SELECT  eh.ReadTime
                                        FROM delta.equipmenttrackhistory_historico eh 
                                        inner join delta.statusdetails sd
                                        on sd.eqmtId = eh.EquipmentId
                                        WHERE  eh.ReadTime > sd.lastReadyTime
                                        AND ReadTime BETWEEN date_Add(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),-90) 
                                        AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
                                        AND eh.StatusId <> 2
                                        limit 1)
                '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
                UPDATE delta.statusdetails 
                SET lastReadyFinishTime = lastReadyTime
                WHERE lastReadyFinishTime is null
                '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

table_name = 'intfMap'
db_name = 'delta'
table_data_path = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataTemp/minecare/delta/' + table_name +'/'
sql_command = f'''
                    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {db_name}.{table_name} (                    
                        EqmtName string,
                        InterfaceName string,
                        ReadTime timestamp
                      )
                    USING DELTA
                    LOCATION '{table_data_path}'
                  '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
			INSERT INTO delta.intfmap
			SELECT eu.Name, oi.Name, MAX(ov.ReadTime) AS ReadDateTime 
			FROM delta.oemeventvalue_historico ov 
			LEFT JOIN delta.oemeventtype_historico ev  ON ev.Id = ov.OemEventTypeId
			LEFT JOIN delta.oeminterface_historico oi  ON oi.Id = ev.OemInterfaceId
			LEFT JOIN delta.equipmentunit_historico eu  ON eu.Id = ov.EquipmentId
			WHERE ov.ReadTime > date_Add(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), -30)
			AND ReadTime BETWEEN date_add(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), -90) AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()  
			--AND datediff(cast((unix_timestamp(ov.ReadTime)-unix_timestamp((cast(ov.ReadTime as TIMESTAMP) + INTERVAL 3 hours)))/(60) as TIMESTAMP), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) > - 1 
			--esta validaciÃ³n no entrega datos por lo tanto se comenta para pruebas
			AND ov.EquipmentId IN (
				SELECT eqmtId
				FROM delta.statusdetails
			)
			AND ( -- Exclude Modular Interface generated events as this does not come from the OEM device --
				ev.Name NOT LIKE '%Interface%Timeout%'
				OR ev.Name NOT LIKE '%Interface%Normal%'
			)
			GROUP BY eu.Name, oi.Name '''

spark.sql(sql_command)

table_name = 'intfMapNDP'
db_name = 'delta'
table_data_path = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataTemp/minecare/delta/' + table_name +'/'
sql_command = f'''
                    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {db_name}.{table_name} (                    
                        EqmtName string,
                        InterfaceName string,
                        ReadTime timestamp
                      )
                    USING DELTA
                    LOCATION '{table_data_path}'
                  '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
INSERT INTO delta.intfMapNDP
SELECT eu.Name, oi.Name, MAX(ndpv.ReadTime) AS ReadDateTime
FROM delta.naturaloemparamvalue_historico ndpv 
LEFT JOIN delta.oemparamtype_historico pt  ON pt.Id = ndpv.OemParamTypeId
LEFT JOIN delta.oeminterface_historico oi  ON oi.Id = pt.OemInterfaceId
LEFT JOIN delta.equipmentunit_historico eu  ON eu.Id = ndpv.EquipmentId
WHERE ndpv.ReadTime > date_add(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),-30) 
--Modificar dias original -4 se aumenta para mostrar datos
AND ndpv.ReadTime <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() 
AND ndpv.EquipmentId IN (
	SELECT eqmtId
	FROM delta.statusdetails
)
GROUP BY eu.Name, oi.Name '''


spark.sql(sql_command)

table_name = 'intfResult'
db_name = 'delta'
table_data_path = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataTemp/minecare/delta/' + table_name +'/'
sql_command = f'''
                    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {db_name}.{table_name} (                    
                        EqmtName string,
                        InterfaceName string,
                        ReadTime timestamp,
                        ReadDiff int,
                        EvntCount int
                      )
                    USING DELTA
                    LOCATION '{table_data_path}'
                  '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
        INSERT INTO delta.intfresult
        SELECT res.EqmtName, res.InterfaceName, res.ReadTime as ReadDateTime, NULL, NULL
        FROM delta.intfmap res '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f''' create or replace temporary view update_view 
                as
                SELECT distinct intNDPRes.EqmtName EqmtName 
                        ,intNDPRes.InterfaceName InterfaceName
                        ,intNDPRes.ReadTime ReadTime
                FROM  delta.intfresult as intfRes
                LEFT JOIN delta.intfmapndp intNDPRes 

                ON  intfRes.EqmtName = intNDPRes.EqmtName 
                AND intfRes.InterfaceName = intNDPRes.InterfaceName

                WHERE intNDPRes.ReadTime > intfRes.ReadTime
                  AND intNDPRes.InterfaceName = intfRes.InterfaceName
                '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
      MERGE INTO delta.intfresult as intfRes
      USING update_view
      ON intfRes.EqmtName = update_view.EqmtName
      and intfRes.InterfaceName  = update_view.InterfaceName
      WHEN MATCHED THEN
        UPDATE SET intfRes.ReadTime = update_view.ReadTime'''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
		UPDATE delta.intfresult
		SET ReadDiff = (
					SELECT 
					cast(
						unix_timestamp(i.ReadTime) 
						+ (unix_timestamp(ReadTime)  -  unix_timestamp((cast(lastReadyFinishTime as TIMESTAMP) + INTERVAL 0 hours)))/(60) 
						as TIMESTAMP)

					FROM delta.statusdetails s
					inner join delta.intfresult i
					on s.eqmtName = i.eqmtName
					limit 1
			)'''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command =f'''
            UPDATE delta.intfresult
            SET ReadDiff = 0
            WHERE ReadDiff < 0'''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command= f'''
			INSERT INTO delta.intfresult
			SELECT eu.Name, oi.Name, '1970-01-01 00:00:00', 99999, NULL
			FROM delta.eqmtoeminterfacemap_historico eim 
			LEFT JOIN delta.oeminterface_historico oi  ON oi.Id = eim.OemInterfaceId
			LEFT JOIN delta.equipmentunit_historico eu  ON eu.Id = eim.EquipmentId
			WHERE oi.Name + ' ' + eu.Name NOT IN
			(
				SELECT ir.InterfaceName + ' ' + ir.EqmtName
				FROM delta.intfresult ir
			)
			AND eu.RecordStatus <> 3'''

spark.sql(sql_command)

table_name = 'ft_Interfaces'
db_name = 'minecare'
table_data_path = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataMultidim/minecare/delta/' + table_name +'/'
sql_command = f'''
                    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {db_name}.{table_name} (                    
                        mc_site_name string,
                        rd_date string,
                        eqmt_name string,
                        interface_name string,
                        interface_state float,
                        last_event float,
                        ReadTime timestamp
                      )
                    USING DELTA
                    LOCATION '{table_data_path}'
                  '''
spark.sql(sql_command)

sql_command = f'''
                INSERT INTO  minecare.ft_interfaces
                SELECT(SELECT Value 
                FROM delta.applicationconfiguration_configuration_historico
                WHERE KEY = 'client.name' AND Scope = 'global') as mc_site_name
                --,DATEADD(HH, @GMTTime, sd.lastReadyFinishTime) as rd_date
                ,date_add(sd.lastReadyFinishTime,0) as rd_date
                ,eu.Name as eqmt_name
                , t2.InterfaceName as interface_name
                ,
                        CASE
                        WHEN t2.ReadDiff = 99999 THEN 4
                        WHEN t2.ReadDiff > 1440 THEN 3
                        WHEN t2.ReadDiff < 1440 AND t2.ReadDiff > 720 THEN 2
                        ELSE 1
                        END as interface_state, t2.ReadDiff as last_event
                        ,current_timestamp()
                FROM delta.intfresult t2
                LEFT JOIN delta.statusdetails sd ON sd.eqmtName = t2.EqmtName
                LEFT JOIN delta.equipmentunit_historico eu ON eu.Id = sd.eqmtId
                LEFT JOIN delta.eqmtmodel_historico em ON em.Id = eu.ModelId
                '''

spark.sql(sql_command)

statusdetailpath = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataTemp/minecare/delta/statusDetails/'
intfMappath = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataTemp/minecare/delta/intfMap/'
intfMapNDPpath = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataTemp/minecare/delta/intfMapNDP/'
intfResultpath = 'abfss://devproc@devmycdlake.dfs.core.windows.net/DataTemp/minecare/delta/intfResult/'

spark.sql('drop table IF EXISTS delta.statusdetails')
if (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, statusdetailpath)):
   mssparkutils.fs.rm(statusdetailpath, recurse=True)

spark.sql('drop table IF EXISTS delta.intfMap')
if (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, intfMappath)):
   mssparkutils.fs.rm(intfMappath, recurse=True)

spark.sql('drop table IF EXISTS delta.intfMapNDP')
if (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, intfMapNDPpath)):
   mssparkutils.fs.rm(intfMapNDPpath, recurse=True)


spark.sql('drop table IF EXISTS delta.intfResult')
if (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, intfResultpath)):
   mssparkutils.fs.rm(intfResultpath, recurse=True)
